title: The Plan
description: A double homicide in upstate New York leads detectives on a cross country investigation to piece together a case with a surprising suspect at the center. Dennis Murphy reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 11, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
